HomePage.Description: I'm Gabriel Bustillo del Cuvillo, a Jack-of-all-trades IT, But officially I'm a Software Developer (and former IT Technician)

Metadata.Title: Gabriel Bustillo del Cuvillo - Jack of the Trades Dev/IT

TestingGround.Description: An improved version of an exercise

OXI.Description: A Highlight Button System for Unreal

Locations.Puerto: El Puerto de Santa Maria, Spain

csharpdev.Description: Due to the suspension of the previous project, My role changed as a support tools maker for ILS and I was one of the few who remained in the software dept company because of my general programming knowledge.

bulletpoints.ExcelParser: Development of Excel Parsers (OpenXML) to S1000D Format

unreal.Description: Development, Optimizations of a VR 3D Model Viewer made with Unreal Engine 5.1 and upgrading to 5.3, Suspended due a business restructuring and reordering of priorities

bulletpoints.ioOptimization: I/O Optimization (reduction of 10-15 Min to a few seconds On Load)
bulletpoints.importOptimizations: Import Asset Optimizations (from 40 minutes to 10 minutes)
bulletpoints.qtTools: Automatized Content Build Pipeline with QT tools

bulletpoints.AbanceReact: A remade version of Abance Web in React (+ some PHP and .htaccess tricks) migrated from Wordpress.

e park.description: Communication Developer for USV (Unmanned surface vehicle) Navantia's project: e-Park for the maintenance of offshore wind, subsidized by the European Union.

bulletpoints.Simulators: Development of two simulators (GPS, WaterSpeed) via NMEA, DIS & a private protocol.
bulletpoints.Bridge: A ZeroMQ-DDS Bridge for the Sonar. (with Request-Reply Paradigm)
bulletpoints.Deploy: Overhaul of build & deployment scripts (for various modules) for pre-production & production.

backend.Description: Creation, design, refactoring and maintenance of Software and unit tests in .NET Framework, Refactoring and migration tasks to .NET Standard/Core for old and new projects

bulletpoints.monitoring: Development of modular monitoring and alarm services/daemons
bulletpoints.graphs: Development of tools for displaying sales graphics in the web administration side.
bulletpoints.azure: Creation of Software for Azure Platform
bulletpoints.tests: Creation and Design of Unit Tests for old and new projects

webapp.Description: Remade a Web Application originally made with Microsoft Silverlight to Node.js with REST API reverse engineering (because lack of documentation)
webapp.improvements: Improving WebApp offering Microsoft Exchange Service Support and Integration like other newer Company’s products.

QuestionModal.Description: Hi!, Thanks for getting interested in me, As I am a multi-disciplined developer, I am obligated to get some resumes optimized for each role, Choose one of these roles to continue.
QuestionModal.Title: Tech Role Chooser

Contact.Heading: Hi!, If you want contact me, You have these options:

Paragraphs.Paragraph1: Hi! I’m Gabriel Bustillo del Cuvillo, a versatile IT professional and software developer from El Puerto de Santa Maria, Spain. With a background as an IT technician, I bring a wealth of knowledge and a hands-on approach to every project I undertake.
Paragraphs.Paragraph2: Since my childhood I had a special interest in Computer, I kind remember using DosBox to run Windows 3.1 when I was 8 y/o (in 2003!), Running Ubuntu 6.04 in an external HDD (one year later), Takedown Computers, helping to fix computers for family & friends, Opening Ports (for servers).
Paragraphs.Paragraph3: As a Jack-of-all-trades in IT, I thrive on tackling diverse challenges and continuously expanding my skill set. My journey in the tech world has seen me delve into various domains, from software development to IT support, always with a focus on delivering innovative solutions.
Paragraphs.Paragraph4: I specialize in full-stack development and am keenly interested in virtual reality (VR) game development. My portfolio includes a range of projects, such as a mystery VR game developed with Unreal Engine, various games developed with Unity, and several custom plugins and frameworks designed to enhance VR experiences.
Paragraphs.Paragraph5: I’m passionate about leveraging technology to create impactful and user-friendly applications. Whether it’s developing a new feature, optimizing existing systems, or exploring cutting-edge technologies, I am committed to excellence and continuous learning.
Paragraphs.Paragraph6: In my free time, you can find me exploring new tech trends, participating in GameJams, contributing to open-source projects, doing some improvisation in my guitars, making documentation about software history in Spain (2000s), or enjoying a game or anime.
